scripts.cdk:synth: cdk synth --version-reporting false --path-metadata false --asset-metadata false -c project=%npm_config_project% -c env=%npm_config_env% -c myip=%npm_config_myip% --profile %npm_config_project%-%npm_config_env%
scripts.cdk:diff: cdk diff --version-reporting false --path-metadata false --asset-metadata false -c project=%npm_config_project% -c env=%npm_config_env% -c myip=%npm_config_myip% --profile %npm_config_project%-%npm_config_env%
scripts.cdk:deploy:all: cdk deploy --all --version-reporting false --path-metadata false --asset-metadata false -c project=%npm_config_project% -c env=%npm_config_env% -c myip=%npm_config_myip% --profile %npm_config_project%-%npm_config_env%
